CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 16, 1960, pg. 4 reads: "CIty Editor Honored - William B. Gillies, right, vice president of the Rust Engineering Company and president of the board of directors, Kay Boys' Club, presents a special award certificate from the National Boys Clubs of America to Frank E. Bolden, City Editor of The Courier. The citation was "for valuable assistance in promotion of the 1960 celebration of National Boys' Club Week." - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Frank Bolden receiving citation from William B. Gilles, president of the board of directors of Kay Boys' Club, for promotion of the 1960 celebration of National Boys' Club Week, standing in office interior
